Class ErrorAttributeOptions

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.web.error.ErrorAttributeOptions
public final class ErrorAttributeOptions extends Object
Options controlling the contents of ErrorAttributes.
Since:
2.3.0
Author:
Scott Frederick, Phillip Webb

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    ErrorAttributeOptions.Include
    Error attributes that can be included in an error response.

  • Method Details

    • isIncluded

      public boolean isIncluded(ErrorAttributeOptions.Include include)
      Get the option for including the specified attribute in the error response.
      Parameters:
      include - error attribute to get
      Returns:
      true if the Include attribute is included in the error response, false otherwise

    • getIncludes

      public Set<ErrorAttributeOptions.Include> getIncludes()
      Get all options for including attributes in the error response.
      Returns:
      the options

    • including

      public ErrorAttributeOptions including(ErrorAttributeOptions.Include... includes)
      Return an ErrorAttributeOptions that includes the specified attribute ErrorAttributeOptions.Include options.
      Parameters:
      includes - error attributes to include
      Returns:
      an ErrorAttributeOptions

    • excluding

      public ErrorAttributeOptions excluding(ErrorAttributeOptions.Include... excludes)
      Return an ErrorAttributeOptions that excludes the specified attribute ErrorAttributeOptions.Include options.
      Parameters:
      excludes - error attributes to exclude
      Returns:
      an ErrorAttributeOptions

    • retainIncluded

      public void retainIncluded(Map<String, @Nullable Object> map)
      Remove elements from the given map if they are not included in this set of options.
      Parameters:
      map - the map to update
      Since:
      3.2.7
